Plot to show morphology clusters in PC space

clusterplots.Rd

'clusterplots' visualizes k-means morphology clusters in PC space

Usage

clusterplots(data, pc.xaxis, pc.yaxis)

Arguments

data

is your input data frame

pc.xaxis

is the pc values you want on x-axis (e.g, PC1)

pc.yaxis

is the pce values you want on y-axis (e.g., PC2)
